scripts.push-landing: git add packages/clubhows-landing/public && git commit -m 'landing push' --no-verify && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix=packages/clubhows-landing/public deploy-landing`:deploy-landing --force && git rm -r --cached packages/clubhows-landing/public/
scripts.push-server: git subtree push --prefix packages/clubhows-server clubhows deploy-server
